body: @sayrchoon maybe he doesn't have time to draw.
I'm happy there is a 3rd part, but why the artstyle not as good as previous part☹️
the art is evolving, just backwards.

honestly if it's  really him then... I've wated for about 1 whole year for this doujin and the art is completely different from part 1 and 2, im still interested in the story of it but the art it's worse that the old ones.
who are you and what have you done with the real bota mochito
I thought its fan-made at first.....

While the overall style seems to be from Bota (but even some stuff have changed from the first part, second part wasn't all that great as first part thou), but this time this shit it's like a total downgrade, as if it was done in a hurry (cuz of C99 deadlines?). Is that what accomplished artists do nowadays, like hire interns to do the stuff for them now, while letting the quality drop?
Bro art style is kinda dogshit lmao, its like if this was one of his/her earliest works lmao

Oi oi, this can't be right. It's fucking ugly. This must be some kind of ugly fan art or someshit. Bota's art style is one of the most beautiful among hentai mangaka. Decent attempt though whoever drew this.

@Luschkar I was thinking just the same. I remember the first two chapters as having some really good art, I even thought this might be one of the earliest works (like the first one of the series) thus the less polished art but that's not the case, I guess maybe the artist did not have enough time then to make it had to rush it.

is it real Bota work's ?
something wrong with his art style ?
compare to previous work it's better than this ....
